endmember_detection/

hiihat_nfindr.pro


Routines

result = hypervolume(data, ids [, keeparray=fltarr(nend,nb+1)])

Calculates the hyperdimensional volume analog by taking the determinant of an augmented endmember matrix.

hiihat_nfindr, fid_image, n_endmembers [, use_dims=dims] [, out_name_sli=string] [, out_name_txt=string] [, roi_outfile=string] [, r_spectra_fid=fix] [, mnf_r_fid=fix] [, abund_r_fid=fix] [, r_endmember_ids=intarr(n_endmembers)] [, seed=fix] [, /reject_zeros] [, /in_memory] [, /verbose], gui_status=gui_status

Applies the NFINDR algorithm of Dr.

Routine details

top source hypervolume

endmember_detection

result = hypervolume(data, ids [, keeparray=fltarr(nend,nb+1)])

Calculates the hyperdimensional volume analog by taking the determinant of an augmented endmember matrix. keeparray is a way to pass the existing data structure around without having to redefine it. Speeds up the processing quite a bit.

Parameters

data in required type=fltarr(nend,nb)

endmember matrix

ids in required type=intarr(nend)

endmember ids

Keywords

keeparray in optional type=fltarr(nend,nb+1)

augmented endmember matrix

Author information

Author:

David Ray Thompson & Lukas Mandrake

top source hiihat_nfindr

endmember_detection

hiihat_nfindr, fid_image, n_endmembers [, use_dims=dims] [, out_name_sli=string] [, out_name_txt=string] [, roi_outfile=string] [, r_spectra_fid=fix] [, mnf_r_fid=fix] [, abund_r_fid=fix] [, r_endmember_ids=intarr(n_endmembers)] [, seed=fix] [, /reject_zeros] [, /in_memory] [, /verbose], gui_status=gui_status

Applies the NFINDR algorithm of Dr. E. Winter to discover endmembers by expanding a simplex to the largest possible volume. May not give a singular answer where no single pixel endmember exists (local maxima), so must be run multiple times with different random seeds.

Parameters

fid_image in required type=fix

fid of image file to process

n_endmembers in required type=fix

number of endmembers to generate

Keywords

use_dims in optional type=dims

user-specified dimensions

out_name_sli in optional type=string

output path for spectra and (optional) roi's

out_name_txt in optional type=string

output path for spectra and (optional) roi's (text format)

roi_outfile in optional type=string

filename of roi file to generate (single pixel ROI's)

r_spectra_fid in optional type=fix

Return fid of the endmember spectra

mnf_r_fid in optional type=fix

Return fid of MNF transformed data

abund_r_fid in optional type=fix

return fid for the abundance image (currently unused)

r_endmember_ids in optional type=intarr(n_endmembers)

Return array of the endmember ids (linear indexes into the img array)

seed in optional type=fix

random seed to use to continue proper random numbers

reject_zeros in optional type=boolean

reject zero or uniform bands

in_memory in optional type=boolean

store output in memory rather than in file

verbose in optional type=boolean

verbose output to console

gui_status

Author information

Author:

David Ray Thompson & Lukas Mandrake
